subject: Welcome to Bank For African (A
body:
Welcome to Bank For African (ACCESS BANK)
Avenue Cotonou,BP 98 Cotonou Benin Republic.
Telex :5211 F BP COTONOU BENIN REPUBLIC.
From the desk of, Mr.James Collins
Director Payment Department.ACCESS Bank Plc
of West African(FB).
Attention Dear Customer
You are welcome to open an online Bank account. We have received
details from Mrs Margret David, regarding opening an online bank
account to enable us clear up your benefit and before we proceed
further.We like you to know that we provide logistics and services on
Commercial, Merchant and Retail On-line Banking, You are welcome to
the Bank of choice where our customers satisfaction is our top most
priority among st other services that has been designed to enhance a
top of the range on-line Banking experience.
ACCOUNT OPENING REQUIREMENTS ARE BELOW:
Since you do not have an existing account with us, you are advised to
sign up for an offshore account to facilitate your funds remittance
process in 24hours. You will have to provide us with a scanned copy of
either your International Passport or any proof of Identity,it is our
desire to make sure that you experience our First Class hospitality in
the world of Banking and this is illustrated by the availability for
you to choose from our various accounts models to suit your business
interest.You are hereby required to make an initial deposit based on
the type of account you wish to hold with the online Bank,the category
of accounts and the initial deposit available are stated below:
ACCOUNT TYPE AVAILABLE DEPENDING ON YOUR CHOICE ARE AS FOLLOWS:
1. SAVING ACCOUNT :This has a minimum deposit of : $50.00
2. CURRENT ACCOUNT : This has a minimum deposit: $75.00
3. Domiciliary Or Non Citizen Account This has a minimum deposit$35
4. PLATINUM ACCOUNT : This has a minimum deposit of:$25.00
5. PREMIUM ACCOUNT : This has a minimum deposit of: $50.00
6. TIME DEPOSIT ACCOUNT : This has a minimum deposit: of:$100.00
Please note that your choice of ACCOUNT MODELS, matters as urgent,and
you are to send your choice fee as quickly as possible to OUR below
protocol officer's information through RIA Or Steam wallet card or
Amazon card or iTunes card. Money Transfer to open the online account
immediately On Your Behalf.
Receiver Name: Jimy Amaca
Country : Benin Republic
City Cotonou
Amount Depends On Ur Choice $
Question: Powerful
Answer: Great
MTCN
Sender name ?
Amount ?
Purpose of the fee
For your account to be activated immediately, you are required to make
available the initial deposit which will be deposited in your account
for it to be fully activate after set-up. 
We are not charging you for
account set up please take NOTE, but this amount will enable us
upgrade your online account into a premium account based on the kind
of transaction you are about to begin.
Thanks in advance for banking with us. I await your swift response. Thank you.
Best Regards,
Mr.James Collins
Regional Director
ACCESS Bank Online Services
Benin Republic.

subject: Re: Welcome to Bank For African (A
body:
Hello Collins,

Thank you for your detailed message. I'm quite interested in opening an online bank account with ACCESS Bank. The services you offer sound very appealing to me.

I have a few questions though, if you don't mind. Could you please explain more about the differences between the various account models? Specifically, what are the benefits of each type of account?

Also, could you clarify what exactly is meant by "initial deposit"? Is this a one-time fee or will there be additional charges in the future?

Lastly, I noticed that there are several options for sending the initial deposit - RIA, Steam wallet card, Amazon card or iTunes card. Could you please provide more information on how these methods work?

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Douglas
